snippet: In a video on Saturday, the leader of the branch said followers were responsible for the killing of several “blasphemers,” including Avijit Roy.
abstract: Asim Umar, leader of Al Qaeda branch in Indian subcontinent, is claiming responsibility for February 2015 killing of atheist Bangladeshi-American blogger Avijit Roy and several other intellectuals opposed to fundamentalist Islam in Bangladesh.
lead_paragraph: In a video on Saturday, the leader of the branch said followers were responsible for the killing of several “blasphemers,” including Avijit Roy.

headline.main: Al Qaeda Branch Claims Responsibility for Bangladeshi Blogger’s Killing
headline.print_headline: Qaeda Branch in South Asia Claims Role in Killings
